title: 5 bedroom Beachside Sea View Villa near Big Buddha
description:
New exclusive listing 

•5 bedroom/5 bathroom luxury pool villa
•200m easy walk to beach and many restaurants/amenities 
•Stunning close up sunset sea views
•Ideally located for solid rental investment 
•Open plan living/dining/kitchen
•Fully fitted designer kitchen with built in appliances 
•Games room/second living/entertaining space 
•Laundry room
•Separate staff quarters 
•Carport with electric gate
•Freehold tenure 
•Chanote land title
